sprints.name: Sprint 2: Catalog & Cart
sprints.goal: Product browsing and shopping cart mechanics.

tickets.title: User Authentication System
tickets.description: Epic tracking all work related to user signup, login, and profile management.

tickets.title: Shopping Cart & Checkout
tickets.description: Epic for cart management, order processing, and payments.

tickets.title: Design Login Page UI
tickets.description: Create high-fidelity mockups for the login screen including error states.

tickets.title: Implement JWT Authentication
tickets.description: Backend implementation of JWT token generation and validation middleware.

tickets.title: Fix: Password Reset Link 404
tickets.description: Clicking the reset link in the email redirects to a broken URL.

tickets.title: Product Database Schema
tickets.description: Define SQL tables for Products, Categories, and Inventory.

tickets.title: Add to Cart Button Logic
tickets.description: As a user, I want to add items to my cart so I can purchase them later.

tickets.title: Stripe Integration Research
tickets.description: Investigate Stripe API documentation and create a POC for payments.

tickets.title: Bug: Mobile Menu Not Closing
tickets.description: The hamburger menu stays open after clicking a link on mobile devices.

tickets.title: User Profile Settings Page
tickets.description: Allow users to update their email and avatar.

tickets.title: Session Timeout Handling
tickets.description: Auto-logout user after 30 mins of inactivity.
